# Load Data

```{r load-data, warning= FALSE, message= FALSE}
X500_cities_diabetes <- read_excel("~/ Stats 198 Project/data/500_Cities_diabetes.xlsx")
X500_cities_health_insurance <- read_excel("~/ Stats 198 Project/data/500_cities_health_insurance.xlsx")
X500_cities_heart_diseases <- read_excel("~/ Stats 198 Project/data/500_cities_heart_diseases.xlsx")
X500_cities_mental_health <- read_excel("~/ Stats 198 Project/data/500_cities_mental_health.xlsx")
```

```{r join-data, message= FALSE, warning= FALSE}
left_join_1 <- Mental_Health_CDC_Cities %>%
  left_join(Insurance_CDC_Cities)
```

```{r join-data-2, message= FALSE, warning= FALSE}
left_join_2 <- left_join_1 %>%
  left_join(Diabetes_CDC_Cities)
```

```{r join-data-3, message= FALSE, warning= FALSE}
final_CDC_data <- left_join_2 %>%
  left_join(Heart_Disease_CDC_Cities)
```
